org.ensembl.variation.datamodel
Interface Population

All Superinterfaces:
Persistent, java.io.Serializable
public interface Population
extends Persistent

A group of individuals. Populations include phenotypic groups (e.g. people with diabetes), ethnic groups (e.g. caucasians), individuals used in an assay (e.g. subjects in experiment X), etc. Populations may be arranged into an arbitrary hierarchy of sub and super populations.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
